complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose the natural language processing pipeline into NLP parsing, workflow generation, planning logic, error recovery, validation, testing, and template management components.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split the AI element detection into core architecture design, computer vision integration, visual recognition, screenshot analysis, intent-based targeting, fallback strategies, and performance optimization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down enterprise security into core architecture, RBAC implementation, policy enforcement, authentication systems, encryption, policy management, compliance logging, and reporting components.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Enterprise-grade security is highly complex, requiring RBAC, encryption, compliance features, and integration with multiple authentication systems. Critical for enterprise adoption.
